attributes.title: Delete this app
attributes.review: This app is gross don’t waste your time on it it took a month to download the quality was trash if you download this app get better taste I don’t want to see an orange looking racist app on my App Store apple delete this at once ! It was a trash app fire who ever made it won’t get it again delete it bow

attributes.title: Very bad don’t download
attributes.review: It’s a horrible disgusting app that’s super unhelpful and boring, the things on there are offensive and hurt my eyes to look at. I want to tear my eye balls out after seeing the bad designs and obnoxious wording , EW help me ,I’m deleting this immediately and I recommend this app to NO ONE please ban it off the AppStore it’s absolutely sick. Thank you apple

attributes.title: Worst app I’ve ever seen
attributes.review: This app is horrendous ,  I felt like the moment I downloaded it my phone was suddenly possessed by the devil . I had to put my phone in the basement in order to sleep peacefully because of the constant demonic noises it was making , will be deleting this app today now I’m gonna go hire a priest to cleanse my house .

attributes.title: Horrible just horrible
attributes.review: Worst app ever. Couldn’t get it to download for weeks, and when it finally did it would take me to unsolicited sites. Every single time I opened the app I opened a website I’ve never seen before. Because of this I’m pretty sure my phone now has a virus. 😡

attributes.title: Absolutely terrible
attributes.review: This app is made terrifically awfully. The downloading process took at lest 6 days and in order to open it you must put in credit card information as well as address and social security number. While using the app I was bombarded with false information. DO NOT RECOMMEND

attributes.title: Privacy Breach
attributes.review: Turns out this app tracks and monitors your location even if I exit out of the app fully and refresh it. I consider this a huge privacy breach. It’s also very lagging as well and I cannot do anything I want. Horrible. If he can’t even monitor an app well then how can he help his country?

attributes.title: Worst app of my life
attributes.review: I tried installing it, it took up almost all of my space on my iPhone, it also took about 1 hour to install, once I got into the app it wanted to know my location and social security number, I don’t trust it so I uninstalled it and now I have breast cancer because of the app

attributes.title: worst 💞 app 💞 ever 💞
attributes.review:
this app made me cry 😪😪😪 its sooo bad and glitchy oml 😡😡😡 i though “mr president” could do better 😔😔😔i’m deleting this app 😞 if i could give this app 0 stars i would 🤩🤩🤩 btw i love y’all and i really hope mr donald trump deletes this because it is trash 🗑🗑🗑 (BLM, ACAB, LGBTQ+, DEMOLISH ICE, JUSTICE FOR ALL, & MINORITIES MATTER) 💕🌈 lol ✨
all🔫the🔫other🔫kids🔫with🔫the🔫pumped🔫up🔫kicks🔫better🔫run🔫better🔫run🔫faster🔫than🔫my🔫gun🔫

attributes.title: App didn’t work for me
attributes.review: This app stopped working when I put my gender as female.  Honestly can’t believe how rude some apps can be.  Just last week I downloaded a cooking app and the official quote for this app was “the kitchen is where the female belongs.  Are you serious???  What am I supposed to do?  Just let every man make decisions for me?

attributes.title: This app should be illegal
attributes.review: This app is HORRIBLE. It kept crashing every time I try to open it. When I did finally make it to the homepage, it was just porn ads to illegal porn sites. There was also propaganda for a fascist government. The owner of this app is a blood thirty vermin. This app needs to be taken down from the apple store
